subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] FM Sweep & Optical Microphone

full_text:
I think someone is trying to get something across, but we can't, ir don't 
quite get the messages. I had one "Frank-You must Look at......" it trials 
off into noise. Just before that "Arkturians Armed!" I'm sure that's a 
metphor. These are form a tape done back in February, but htehy often talk 
as if up to the moment.


Frank
